item.description:
Be a part of the Boston 9/11 Truth push to get the Truth out on July 4th

Come to the big strategy meeting at the Café this Sunday to discuss strategy for
canvassing the esplanade on the 4th. 2:00 pm

More than likely we'll be passing out handouts from 9-5, on July 4th so people can join
the effort when it's convenient.

The Sunday meeting is to make maps of the area, determine meet-up locations
and assign group leaders and talk strategy.

Be there!

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Strategy meeting, about July 4th at the Café
